    BluetoothConnection.Callback

    BluetoothManager.BluetoothReaderFactory
    This interface allows for external BluetoothReaders to be registered by a plugin.

    Class Description
    BluetoothASCIIClientConnection  
    BluetoothBinaryClientConnection  
    BluetoothConnection  
    BluetoothCotManager
    Manages the actual Bluetooth channel and socket reading for LRF packets.
    BluetoothDevicesConfig
    List of supported Bluetooth Device Configurations
    BluetoothFragment
    Base hook into ATAK for Bluetooth initialization.
    NOTE: the PLRF15c Bluetooth password is '0'.
    BluetoothManager
    Manages the Bluetooth Laser Range Finder (LRF) connections.
    BluetoothReader
    Manages the connection and reading from specific supported laser range finders.
